sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>wf_workflow_version</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete Activity Variables</name> <order>110</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var gr = new GlideRecord("wf_activity"); gr.addQuery("workflow_version", current.getUniqueValue()); gr.query(); while(gr.next()) { var toDel = new GlideRecord("sys_variable_value"); toDel.addQuery("document_key", gr.getUniqueValue()); toDel.query(); if(toDel.hasNext()) { toDel.deleteMultiple(); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-12-16 23:39:15</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1b52de728f101200d95374f137bdee6b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete Activity Variables</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Workflow Runtime Engine" source="com.glideapp.workflow">b6467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f4a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1b52de728f101200d95374f137bdee6b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>harry.nelson</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-12-17 00:25:06</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1b52de728f101200d95374f137bdee6b"/> </record_update>
